Title: DAYNAME()
Description:
Returns the name of the weekday for
          date. The language used for the
          name is controlled by the value of the
          lc_time_names system variable
          (see Section 12.16, “MySQL Server Locale Support”). Returns
          NULL if date is
          NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT DAYNAME('2007-02-03');
        -> 'Saturday'
